actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact spell_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 3 3
age_of_exile stat give @s exact physical_weapon_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe2 3 3
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health FLAT origin_aoe3 100 100
age_of_exile stat give @s exact mana FLAT origin_aoe4 100 100
age_of_exile stat give @s exact armor GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe5 -7 -7
age_of_exile stat give @s exact elemental_resist GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe6 -7 -7

name: 능력치
description:
기본 체력 +100
기본 마나 +100
총 물리무기피해 +3%
총 주문피해 +3%
총 방어력,속성저항 -7%
